00025 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"

00027 #include "lpc17xx_nvic.h"
00028 #include "lpc17xx_systick.h"

00030 #include "lpc17xx_pinsel.h"

00032 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00038 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINTIONS*************************/
00039 /* Interrupt mode
00040  * - 0: Tail-chaining interrupt
00041  * - 1: Late-arriving interrupt
00042  */
00043 #define INT_MODE        1
00044 
00045 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTIONS *************************/
00046 void EINT0_IRQHandler(void);
00047 void EINT3_IRQHandler(void);
00048 
00049 void print_menu(void);
00050 void delay (void);
00051 
00052 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00053 /*********************************************************************/
00059 void EINT0_IRQHandler(void)
00060 {
00061         uint8_t i;
00062         EXTI_ClearEXTIFlag(EXTI_EINT0);
00063         for (i= 0; i<10; i++)
00064         {
00065                 GPIO_SetValue(1,(1<<29));
00066                 delay();
00067                 GPIO_ClearValue(1,(1<<29));
00068                 delay();
00069         }
00070 }
00071 
00072 /*********************************************************************/
00078 void EINT3_IRQHandler(void)
00079 {
00080         uint8_t j;
00081         if (GPIO_GetIntStatus(0, 25, 1))
00082         {
00083                  GPIO_ClearInt(0,(1<<25));
00084                 for (j= 0; j<10; j++)
00085                 {
00086                         GPIO_SetValue(1,(1<<28));
00087                         delay();
00088                         GPIO_ClearValue(1,(1<<28));
00089                         delay();
00090                 }
00091         }
00092 }
00093 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00094 /*********************************************************************/
00099 void delay (void) {
00100   unsigned int i;
00101 
00102   for (i = 0; i < 0x400000; i++) {
00103   }
00104 }
00105 
00106 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00107 /*********************************************************************/
00112 int c_entry (void)
00113 {
00114         EXTI_InitTypeDef EXTICfg;
00115         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00116 
00117         /* Configure:
00118          *              + LED1: P1.28
00119          *              + LED2: P1.29
00120          */
00121         GPIO_SetDir(1, (1<<28)|(1<<29), 1);
00122 
00123         /* Setting P2.10 as EINT0 */
00124         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00125         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00126         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00127         PinCfg.Pinnum = 10;
00128         PinCfg.Portnum = 2;
00129         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00130 
00131         /* Initialize External 0 interrupt */
00132         EXTI_Init();
00133         EXTICfg.EXTI_Line = EXTI_EINT0;
00134         /* edge sensitive */
00135         EXTICfg.EXTI_Mode = EXTI_MODE_EDGE_SENSITIVE;
00136         EXTICfg.EXTI_polarity = EXTI_POLARITY_LOW_ACTIVE_OR_FALLING_EDGE;
00137         EXTI_Config(&EXTICfg);
00138 
00139 
00140 #if (INT_MODE == 0) //same group, different sub-levels (Tail-chaining example)
00141         NVIC_SetPriorityGrouping(4); //sets group priorities: 8 - subpriorities: 3
00142         NVIC_SetPriority(EINT0_IRQn, 2);  //000:10 (bit 7:3)  assign eint0 to group 0, sub-priority 2 within group 0
00143         NVIC_SetPriority(EINT3_IRQn, 1);  //000:01 (bit 7:3)  assign gpioint to group 0, sub-priority 1 within group 0
00144 #else //different group - (Late-arriving example)
00145         NVIC_SetPriorityGrouping(4);  //sets group priorities: 8 - subpriorities: 3
00146         NVIC_SetPriority(EINT0_IRQn, 0);   //000:00 (bit 7:3) assign eint0 to group 0, sub-priority 0 within group 0
00147         NVIC_SetPriority(EINT3_IRQn, 4);   //001:00 (bit 7:3) assign GPIO int to group 1, sub-priority 0 within group 1
00148 #endif
00149 
00150         NVIC_EnableIRQ(EINT0_IRQn);
00151         NVIC_EnableIRQ(EINT3_IRQn);
00152 
00153         //Enable GPIO interrupt  P0.25/AD0.2
00154         GPIO_IntCmd(0,(1<<25),1);
00155 
00156         while(1);
00157 }
00158 
00159 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00160  allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00161  heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00162  toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00163  file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00164 int main(void) {
00165         return c_entry();
00166 }

00168 #ifdef  DEBUG

00171  *                              where the CHECK_PARAM error has occurred.
00172  * @param[in]   file Pointer to the source file name
00173  * @param[in]    line assert_param error line source number
00174  * @return              None
00175  *******************************************************************************/
00176 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line) {
00177         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00178          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00179 
00180         /* Infinite loop */
00181         while (1)
00182                 ;
00183 }
00184 #endif

00187  * @}
